posts.post_text: March 31, 2016 at 3:03 PM#3[color=#66FF00]Default[/color] is an action. So [color=#66FF00]Default Feature[/color] "Position" or [color=#66FF00]Default Presettype[/color] 2.

title: Macro to send moving lights to home position
